ItemDesc: Upon use, increases all allies' ATK by <unbreak>45%</unbreak> and decreases DEF by <unbreak>12%</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: A liquid with unidentified floating substances. It's said to be a unique medicinal tea formula from the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, which they refuse to disclose even under torture. It tastes disgusting, the ingredients are a mystery, and its effectiveness is questionable. It's best not to drink it.\n\n"It might not necessarily work, but it definitely tastes awful."
